g++   -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/goodFeatureToTrack.dir/src/goodFeatureToTrack.cpp.o  -o ../bin/goodFeatureToTrack -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ts.a /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_contrib.so.2.4.8 -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt /usr/local/lib/libopencv_nonfree.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ocl.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gpu.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_legacy.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.2.4.8 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.8 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
